meanings.definition: A person or company that sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The vendor at the market sold fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The online vendor delivered the package right to my doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The vendor at the fair juggled while selling cotton candy to kids.
meanings.sent4: The vendor of happiness spread smiles wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The vendor's colorful stall caught the attention of many passersby.

meanings.sent1: The street vendor offered handmade jewelry to tourists.
meanings.sent2: The vendor provided the materials needed for the project.
meanings.sent3: The vendor at the concert sang while selling merchandise.
meanings.sent4: The vendor of dreams made wishes come true for many.
meanings.sent5: The vendor's friendly demeanor made customers feel welcome.
